name: recall_information
description: This function recalls information in a file. It is useful to recall large amounts of information that have been stored to memory previously.

args.name: file_name
args.description: A string representing the name of the file where the information was stored.

return_value.description: A string representing the information that was stored in the file.
return_value.example_value: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth, upon this continent, a new nation, conceived in liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. [...]
